name: Create a vendor invoice with a discount but without tax or other charges

steps.name: Given I visit the NYB admin website and log in as a user with create, edit, and view access,
When I navigate to the Inventory module,
Then I verify the Inventory module URL,
When I choose the document type as "Vendor Invoice",
When I select the new vendor,
When I Enter Vendor Invoice No,
When I enter a valid inward quantity, valid damaged quanity, valid unit price, valid batch number, valid expiry date,
Then I verify the Invoice & Packing Slip landing page URL,
When I filter the document no,
Then I verify that the document is successfully created and displayed,

fullName: Product Inward from New Vendor with Vendor Invoice as Document Type: Create a vendor invoice with a discount but without tax or other charges

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Product Inward from New Vendor with Vendor Invoice as Document Type
